definitions.definition: An instrument of attack or defense in combat or hunting, e.g. most guns, missiles, or swords.
definitions.example: The club that is now mostly used for golf was once a common weapon.

definitions.definition: An instrument or other means of harming or exerting control over another.
definitions.example: Money is the main weapon of modern oligarchs.

definitions.definition: An idiot, an oaf, a fool, a tool; a contemptible or incompetent person.
